sentences.en: A single Compare button might more accurately represent the action to users.
sentences.cn: 单个比较按钮可能会将更精确的操作呈现给用户.

sentences.en: All the people who know this secret represent a security risk.
sentences.cn: 凡是知道这个秘密的人都对安全造成危险.

sentences.en: Analyses of economic indicators represent the forecaster's " crystal ball ".
sentences.cn: 经济指标的分析,象征着预测者用以占卜的 “ 水晶球 ”.

sentences.en: For many they clearly represent an alternative to run-of-the-mill estate cars.
sentences.cn: 对于很多人来说，他们显然可以作为一般旅行车的替代品。

sentences.en: He hated the school and everything it represented.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌学校及其象征的一切。

sentences.en: Hydrocarbons ( HC ), like carbon monoxide, represent unburned and wasted fuel.
sentences.cn: 碳氢化合物 ( HC ) 像一氧化碳一样, 为未燃尽的和被浪费掉的燃料.

sentences.en: I can only represent it to you by metaphors.
sentences.cn: 我只能用隐喻来向你描述它.

sentences.en: I will represent to him the risks he is running.
sentences.cn: 我将向他说明他所冒的危险.

sentences.en: I'll represent to him the risk he is running.
sentences.cn: 我要向他指出他所面临的险境.

sentences.en: Insurance can represent a significant portion of the total price of a holiday.
sentences.cn: 度假总费用里保险费可能会占据相当大的一部分。

sentences.en: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.cn: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

sentences.en: Paintings representing religious themes were common in medieval times.
sentences.cn: 表现宗教主题的绘画作品在中世纪很常见。

sentences.en: The article represents the millionaire as a simple family man.
sentences.cn: 文章把这位百万富翁描述成一个简朴的居家男人。

sentences.en: The best way to represent the isotactic structure is with molecular models.
sentences.cn: 表示等规结构的最好方法是用分子模型.

sentences.en: The figures represent a general decline in employment.
sentences.cn: 这些数字显示就业人数总体在下降。

sentences.en: The figures represent such overwhelming human misery that the mind wants to shut it out.
sentences.cn: 这些数据表明人类经受了如此深重的苦难，对此人们都不愿想起。

sentences.en: The film purported to represent the lives of ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 这部影片声称旨在表现普通人的生活.

sentences.en: The popular press tends to represent him as an environmental guru.
sentences.cn: 大众媒体往往把他描绘成环保领袖。

sentences.en: These proposals represent a realistic starting point for negotiation.
sentences.cn: 这些建议是谈判的现实出发点。

words.tran_cn: 能被代表的；能上演的；能被描绘的
典型的，有代表性的；代议制的

trans.tran_cn: 代表，象征，维护…的利益，相当于，描绘，正式提出
trans.tran_en: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

trans.tran_cn: 代表， 作为…的代表； 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
trans.tran_en: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people
